question:
Some people get into debt by buying thing they don’t need and can’t afford.

What are the reasons for this behaviour?
What action can be taken to prevent people from having this problem?
text: In recent day, it is has been an increasing concern that several individuals stay out of debt because of unnecessary consumption. In this essay, I will show some causes and solutions of this issue.

There are numerous reasons why consumers buy products which is not suitable for them. It is obvious that advertisement has a great influence on our lives. Companies make an attempt to produce an attractive advertise which can effectively persuade people to buy their products. An enterprise tend to invite a popular idol in their advertisement, as a typical example, which attracts juveniles in some ways. As a result, they completely want to buy this product to mimic their celebrity in spite of its unnecessary. Addtionionaly, teenagers are likely to keep up this trend because of being anxious about becoming old-fashioned people.

There are a variety of preventions to tackle the problem. First, parents should teach their children how to use money reasonable. Second, consumers need to carefully consider to buy something. In the other words, they should balance their money and purpose of consuming any products. Third, those who want to buy some products need to be careful about eye-catching advertisement. For example, when companies sell their smart phone, they often make an advertising which exaggarate the feature of their product to attract their consumers. As a result, some people will buy even they can not affordable.
In conclusion, it is undeniable that getting into debt due to buying unnecessary things is a huge issue, There are some causes of this behaviour and several solutions dealing with this problem.
